home.introTitle: A Legacy Born in Georgian Soil
home.introText: Nestled in the heart of Georgia's ancient winemaking region, Mogzauri Wine Cellar carries forward an 8,000-year tradition of viticulture. Our wines are crafted with reverence for the land, the vine, and the timeless art of Georgian winemaking.
home.philosophyText: Every bottle of Mogzauri tells a story of sun-drenched vineyards, hand-harvested grapes, and the patient alchemy of fermentation in traditional qvevri vessels. We believe great wine is not merely made — it is cultivated, nurtured, and ultimately revealed.

about.pageSubtitle: A journey through centuries of Georgian winemaking tradition
about.storyText: Founded in 2023, Mogzauri Wine Cellar draws upon millennia of Georgian winemaking wisdom. The name "Mogzauri" — meaning "traveler" in Georgian — reflects our journey to bring the world's oldest wine tradition to modern connoisseurs. Our estate sits upon some of Georgia's most prized terroir, where the unique combination of climate, altitude, and soil composition creates wines of extraordinary character.
about.philosophyText: We embrace the ancient Georgian method of fermenting wine in qvevri — large clay vessels buried in the earth. This UNESCO-recognized technique allows the wine to develop complex flavors through natural temperature regulation and gentle oxidation. Every step of our process honors the land and the legacy it carries.
about.vineyardText: Our vineyards span across carefully selected plots, each chosen for its unique microclimate and soil profile. We cultivate indigenous Georgian grape varieties — Saperavi, Rkatsiteli, and Kisi — alongside select international cultivars, creating wines that are distinctly Georgian yet universally celebrated.
about.craftText: From hand-harvesting at optimal ripeness to aging in Georgian oak and qvevri, every decision reflects our commitment to uncompromising quality. Our winemaker combines generations of knowledge with modern precision, ensuring each vintage expresses the true essence of its origin.

visit.pageSubtitle: Experience the beauty of Georgian winemaking firsthand
visit.descriptionText: Step into a world where ancient tradition meets modern hospitality. Our estate offers an immersive experience into the heart of Georgian winemaking, surrounded by breathtaking vineyard landscapes and the warm spirit of Caucasian culture.
visit.tastingText: Join our guided tasting sessions where you will explore our full collection alongside traditional Georgian dishes. Our sommelier will guide you through the unique characteristics of each wine, sharing stories of the land and the craft behind every bottle.

footer.tagline: Crafting exceptional wines in the heart of Georgia since 2023.
